allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: project scaffolding and IDEA spec

Set up claw-cage repo with BMAD framework, Claude Code commands,
and the full project specification \(IDEA.md\) for a secure,
Docker-first OpenClaw deployment template.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add BMAD BMM module \(Agile AI-Driven Development\)

Install the full BMad Method module with 9 agents \(Analyst, Architect,
Dev, PM, QA, Scrum Master, Solo Dev, Tech Writer, UX Designer\) and
25 workflows covering the complete agile development lifecycle.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
